LanguageData.RV2_Settings_DBH_LimitToiletDisposalToCo: Limit toilet disposal to product containers
Disabling this means that living prey will be ejected into toilets
LanguageData.RV2_DBH_ToiletAllowedForDumpingDescripti: Can dead prey be released into this toilet? If no toilets that allow for prey dumping, the pawn may dump the prey on the floor.
